name: Terra (rōninwulf)
description:
A 3D physics puzzle based on the classic marble maze game. Guide orbs along labyrinthian pathways toward the target zone. Be careful though as obstacles and traps may lurk in every corner and some orbs might not be the same. A flaming orb might ignite something but mossy stone can douse it temporarily, coal is light and delicate but stone is heavy and can withstand anything.

CONTROLS:

Left Click drag towards directionTilt mazeRight Click drag up/downAdjust camera heightTap SpacebarReset maze tiltHold ShiftShow hints/tips if available


ORB TYPES:

WOOD

Lightweight but flammable basic orbSTONE

Heavy and sturdyMOSSY STONE

Less durable than stone but can douse flames temporarily.COAL

Burnt wood. Very delicate and very lightFIRE

Ignites wood and coal. Sturdy when lit.
